page.title: 16POST OFFICE
page.content: The Post Office at Babcary is very small and classified as Grade II. It deals with both overseas and inland letters, and only small packages. Like most Post Offices it issues Television stamps and postage stamps It also serves as the village confectionary shop, and sells sweets and drinks, but it does not sell actual food for meals. Business is low, and due to the little business Babcary's only shop will close down sometime during July this year. Situated in the middle of Babcary, the Post Office is growing smaller and smaller every month, and after July the people in Babcary will have to go elsewhere for their stamps.
